pages.text: Although consisting of two separate objects, when combined the mortar & pestle is essential for any wild mage.$(br2)$(info) The mortar & pestle are $(l:spells/introduction)used to create spell dusts$() as well as some $(l:crafting/mortar_and_pestle#resources)important resources$().$(br2)Other, more mundane uses for the mortar & pestle can be found listed in their entirety $(uses:roots:mortar)in JEI$().

pages.title: Important Resources
pages.text: Some important resources that can be made using the mortar & pestle include the following:$(li)$(l:resources/runic_dust)Runic dust$() is processed from $(l:resources/runestone)runestone$().$(li)$(l:resources/petals)Petals$() can be crafted from any combination of small or tall flowers.$()$(br2)Other useful, Vanilla resources that can be created include:$(li)Bone meal from bones (with increased output).$(li)Flint can be directly produced from gravel.

$(li)Blaze powder from blaze rods (with increased output).$(li)Magma creams from magma blocks.$(li)Sugar from sugar cane (with increased output).$(li)Silk thread from silkworm cocoons (although not as efficient as a spindle).$(li)Orange dye from carrots.$(br2)As mentioned previously, all recipes, including those added or adjusted by modpacks, can be found $(uses:roots:mortar)in JEI$().
